item.description:
ASMP New England Presents
Tuesday, November 20th, 2007
The unique world of Nikon legendary shooter Jody Dole

ASMP New England Presents

Tuesday, November 20th, 2007

The unique world of Nikon legendary shooter Jody Dole



New York City advertising Photographer and Digital pioneer Jody Dole will show and tell all at our next meeting.

Industry award winner Dole gained commercial success with his highly original worldwide ad campaign for Smirnoff in the 1990's becoming one of the photography world?s rising stars. Dole pioneered the first digital photography capture used in advertising in NY and created the first wide format, digitally printed still life photographic images with Nikon, Inc. displayed at Nikon House at Rockefeller Center in 1992.
Dole's images have appeared in thousands of ads and editorial spreads. His work has been profiled photo & design publications here and abroad including cover features in Communication Arts, Graphis Magazine and American Photo. Jody Dole attended School of Visual Arts in Manhattan, Pratt Institute in Brooklyn, NY and holds an honorary Masters Degree from Brooks Institute in Santa Barbara, CA.
Place: EP Levine, 23 Dry Dock Avenue, South Boston
Time: 6:00 PM Social - food and drinks provided by Blue Ribbon BBQ, 7:00 PM Program
Cost: Members: Free, Students: $5, All others: $20

For details and directions, go to: www.asmpnewengland.org

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: The unique world of Nikon legendary shooter Jody Dole
